main event: An unidentified object thought to be a flying saucer was observed by approximately 5500 people in Brasilia, Brazil on November 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 15 meters in diameter and flew at an altitude of about 12,000 meters., An Air Force plane ascended to 3,000 meters to observe the object, but could not gather additional information., The sighting attracted a large crowd of approximately 5500 observers., The object returned to its base without making any sound or leaving a trail., There is speculation that the object was a balloon, but insufficient data is available to support this conclusion.
sighted object: unidentified flying object thought to be a flying saucer
